name: maker-console
description: Maker is the command line interface included for ExpressWebJs. Maker exists at the root of your application as the maker script and provides a number of helpful commands that can assist you while you build your application. To view a list of all available Maker commands, you may use the help command.
author: AlexIgbokwe <juvitafrica@gmail.com> (https://expresswebjs.com)
